Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. I believe it could greatly benefit you and enhance your daily life or work. Considering its outstanding features and the effort put into its creation, I am offering it to you for $125. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the unique benefits and experiences it promises. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $125. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $125
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
